title: Shakey character model
body: When I play the game with a locked camera my character model, healthbar, and name all shake. I have tried to turn off vertical sync, but this them makes it so my game jumps frames every few seconds. I have tried restoring my original video settings, but that didn't help either. Lastly, I uninstalled and reinstalled and the problem is still there. As you can imagine this is very frustrating, can anyone help?

replies.body: You might have some outdated drivers that could be causing problems rendering content in the game.  I suggest using the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide just in case to make sure your PC is tuned up for league.  Hope it helps!
